member.name: M:Cadru.ApiClient.Extensions.ModelSerializationExtensions.ToKeyValuePairs(System.Object,System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Converts the value of a type to a collection of .
member.param: The value to convert.
The options to control serialization behavior.
member.returns: A collection of instances which represent the value.

remarks.para: The value is first serialized to a JSON string, which is then recursively parsed to create the key/value pairs.
Nested objects are defined using keys which show their hierarchy in dot (".") notation, and collections are shown using an indexed notation.

member.name: P:Cadru.ApiClient.Services.ResponseParser.SerializerOptions
member.summary: Provides options to be used with JSON serialization.

remarks.para:
When overriding in a derived class, don't create a new instance each time this property is accessed by declaring it as
public override JsonSerializerOptions SerializerOptions => new JsonSerializerOptions();

It's safe to use the same instance across multiple threads. The metadata caches on the options instance are thread-safe, and the instance is immutable after the first serialization or deserialization.
